item.title: Use Windows command as a hacker-Part 1
item.description:
Do you want to make your friends amazed by your computer skill and praise you as genius? Or the hacker as watched in Sci-Fi movies? You don’t need Mac, Linux or other operating systems, just Windows, you can show-off and look like hacker and master of Zeroes and Ones, even you have no any idea of it. Here are some tricks by which you can show-off.

Start the Windows command prompt without mouse, change the color of text on Windows terminal

  • Use use hotkeys to open Run feature in two keystrokes: Win+R

  • Type cmd and press Enter

  • Type color A to change the color of text to Green

  • Change the title to Hacker Tool

  • List the folders of current directory

    C:\>User\<yourname>\color A
C:\>User\<yourname>\title Hacker Tool
C:\>User\<yourname>\cd \
C:\>tree
